headline: What Makes Pacific Gas & Electric (PCG) an Investment Bet?
summary: Greenlight Capital, an investment management company, released its third-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The Greenlight Capital funds returned -3.6% in the quarter, net of fees and expenses, compared to 8.1% for the S&P 500 index. The fund returned 0.4% in YTD compared to 14.8% for the index. […]

headline: Morgan Stanley Raises PG&E (PCG) PT to $21 on Utilities’ Data Center Focus
summary: PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) is one of the best large cap stocks to buy under $20. On October 22, Morgan Stanley raised the price target on PG&E to $21 from $19.50, while keeping an Equal Weight rating on the shares. The decision came out as the firm updated its price targets for Regulated & Diversified Utilities/IPPs […]

headline: How is PG&E Corporation (PCG) One of the Best Affordable Stocks to Buy Under $20?
summary: PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) is one of the best affordable stocks to buy under $20. headline: PG&E (PCG) One-Off $609M Loss Tests Bullish Margin Narratives This Earnings Season
summary: PG&E (PCG) posted a net profit margin of 9.6% for the past year, a slight dip from last year’s 10.2%. The company also recognized a substantial one-off loss of $609.0 million that weighed on its trailing twelve-month performance. Despite this setback, the company averaged an impressive 61.3% annual earnings growth over the last five years. Future earnings growth is forecast at 9.7% per year, although this is expected to trail the broader US market’s expectations. Margins are under a bit more...
